name: Apple, Dried Cherry, and Walnut Salad Base
recipeIngredient: 5oz bag mixed baby greens (10 cups lightly packed

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and core apples. Chop into matchstick-sized strips.
Toss greens, apples, cherries, and 1/4 cup walnuts in large bowl to combine. Toss with enough dressing to coat. Divide salad equally among all plates. Sprinkle remaining 1/4 cup walnuts and serve.
